welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ismailia, Egypt! Known for its beautiful lakes, charming gardens, and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all the wonders this city has to offer.

restaurants.name: El-Sala A'al Nabi (الصلاة ع النبي)
restaurants.description: El-Sala A'al Nabi (الصلاة ع النبي) is a seafood restaurant located in الإسماعيلية.
